授業目的: Students will be introduced to a wide range of communication strategies at the intermediate level.
到達目標: Students will be introduced to a wide range of comminication strategies at the intermediate level aimed at moving them from reading English documents for the purpose of translation into Japanese to managing fiction and non-fiction documents entirely in English.  The course will emphasize reading primarily and also speaking, listening, and writing.  Course will be conducted in English.  Students will learn skills in everyday communication.  Students will learn how to communicate with others in a fluent way.  Students will also learn good pronunciation in this class
授業方法:
Project style learning will be offered and students will be able to develop their own ideas in order to become responsible for their own learning. They will accomplish these projects along with others in a group, giving them ample opportunity to engage with their classmates.
